American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, "What just happened?'? Owens. Ann Marie Buerkle , in an interview, said she welcomes the idea of sitting with her Central New York neighbors from both parties. She said it would be great to expand the idea. It would be nice for the whole New York delegation to sit together, Ann Marie Buerkle said. The delegation has 21 Democrats and eight Republicans.
